dt: {bc}the ripened and variously modified walls of a plant ovary composed of an outer {d_link|exocarp|exocarp}, middle {d_link|mesocarp|mesocarp}, and inner {d_link|endocarp|endocarp} layer {dx}see {dxt|endocarp|endocarp|illustration}{/dx}

et: New Latin {it}pericarpium{/it}, from Greek {it}perikarpion{/it} pod, from {it}peri-{/it} + {it}-karpion{/it} -carp
shortdef: the ripened and variously modified walls of a plant ovary composed of an outer exocarp, middle mesocarp, and inner endocarp layer
